page.title: 13ANNUAL EVENTS IN REETH
page.content: {REETH SHOW} The Show is held in the last week in August in a field just over the bridge.There are 2 big tents which hold all the entries for the sponsored Competitions. Entries include items such as Arts and Crafts,Flower arrangements,Baking ,Photography,Hand Writing,and Vegetables. Outside there are sheep dog trials,horse competions and lots of stalls for local traders to show and demonstrate their wares. {REETH SPORTS} The Sports are held in August and begins with a Fancy Dress Competition.The events are mainly for young people, one of the chief events being the Fell Race up Fremington Edge and back. {THE FAIR }It comes about the same time as the Show it is set up on the Green.
